website_summaries.verdict: Despite some sizing challenges and longevity concerns, these shoes are handsome, comfortable, and built for the game.
pros: Stylish basketball shoe named in honor of one of the most exciting basketball players
In addition to good looks, offer superior ankle support and overall comfort
cons: Sizes have the tendency to run on the small side, especially for those who normally wear wide widths
Some reports of rips in the toe area after time on the court

customer_reviews.title: opening  of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: the size fits and so as the width .. its the opening of shoe that has a tight fit... .... if only the designer made the opening stretchable(like vans slip on)... since it has a velcro stap ... just be perfect..
customer_reviews.author: Rolly .C

customer_reviews.title: I'm good
customer_reviews.text: as I expected good quality and exactly the actual color of the photo I like a lot so I give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Cotumo serv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband to play basketball. He loves them. He is a huge Le Bron James fan and he loves his shoes. He says they are very comfortable and there is extra padding inside. The only this is that it's a tad bit difficult to put on at first because it's like a foot glove. But it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: black beauty

customer_reviews.title: ... the shoes I wear and these make you feel like you are playing basketball on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: I have feet and ankle problems from sports so I am really picky about the shoes I wear and these make you feel like you are playing basketball on a cloud! Fits like a sock with great ankle support. Very nice and comfortable shoe with style.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Breedlove

customer_reviews.title: Good ankle support and stability, Great for playing outdoors
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected and provide really good ankle support due to the straps that extend from the base of the shoe up to the ankle area. Those straps also keep your foot in place and prevent it from sliding around the inner sole of the shoe. As for durability, I play mainly outdoors and these shoes are holding up really well. The rubber on the bottom of the shoe is both thick and pretty stiff, so I expect it to last for a while. And it doesn't hurt that these shoes and colorway do look nice.
customer_reviews.author: V P

customer_reviews.title: They looked good, light and I wanted to have them
customer_reviews.text: They were too difficult to wear. Took me 10 minutes or so to squeeze in my foot and when I finally had it on, it felt a bit comfy but too tight. These pairs were badly manufactured. They looked good, light and I wanted to have them. And I ordered these a size bigger, as I actually do with all my sneakers. Next time I'll head to footlocker to size them up.
customer_reviews.author: John Lesnar

customer_reviews.title: Best soldier shoe from the line
customer_reviews.text: Has become my favorite shoe since I first put them on. Shoe is true to size, shoe is 100% authentic. It's is a great looking shoe, I get plenty of compliments and I love having no laces.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Spencer

customer_reviews.title: God-Tier Nike Soldier XI shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. They fit perfectly, and they are SO comfortable. They have like memory foam/gel cushions at the ankle and the toes and the sides. Not to mention they look PHENOMENAL!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonpitt

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, just hard to get whole foot through the opening.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Used? Maybe.
customer_reviews.text: Box was mangled and taped back together and the shoes themselves had animal hair on them but dont appear to have any wear. A little disappointed but this is what I get for not paying closer attention to the listing. I'd have bought them from Ebay of I wanted shady goods.
customer_reviews.author: Kris M.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color — but the sneakers perform beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Lebron’s line of basketball shoes are among the few lines of shoes I can almost always expect to fit in my true size. Usually shoes in general are way too narrow in the toe box for me but the Lebron Soldier XI (and XV) fit me there very well. I appreciate the flexibility in fit that the Velcro allows for. I’ll update my review after they’ve seen some more gameplay but so far I’m satisfied fit and performance-wise... BUT I’m taking 2 stars off because I was sent the completely wrong color. I purchased them for a game and needed them ASAP so I’m sticking with the color I was sent.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Pena

customer_reviews.title: Not to happy with the shoes.
customer_reviews.text: They look better in the picture. They look generic in hand. Also there to wide up front. Like before the toe. I spent ALOT of money on these, wet look to be awesome shoes I was real excited about it but when I got them they just look generic.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: High bridges make these tough to put on
customer_reviews.text: My son has a very high bridge and could barely get his heel into the shoe so sadly, we returned them. They were great looking shoes but unfortunately he just has the type of foot that can't get into high tops
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Holder-Hale

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for Basketball
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for Basketball. He loves the Lebron Soldier XI and has bought several pairs. They have been discontinued and are harder to find but a great shoe for basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Lori W.

customer_reviews.title: 100% love them
customer_reviews.text: A bit snug at first until you break them in. After that they are the perfect sneakers! From ballin to regular workouts, boxing, hitting the gym etc.. tough, durable, lightweight and ankle/foot/arch support. Color, design, everything on point!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Wide Footers, try them on first!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived promptly in perfect shape with the original box. However, I should have tried them on at footlocker or something beforehand because the 1 piece construction fits my wider feet just a little too tight. I really like the look and feel of the shoe, my feet are just too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Summers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoe. I have had recurring ankle problems and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoe. I have had recurring ankle problems and used Currys in the past. These shoes have great support, no slippage, look nice as well. The no laces is a benefit in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe - (I waited few months before writing this review)
customer_reviews.text: Wanted high tops for ankle support but the just velcro straps (i.e. no laces) made me extremely nervous. Bit the bullet and decided to give em a try. LOVE them. I've balled for about 20 years and am impressed. The one thing to note, is the other reviewers aren't lying...the first 4-5 times it is HARD to get your foot in the shoe. Once they get a little worn in it's not as bad. Overall A++ shoe. Won't go back to another one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Photo and description are of two different shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were not what we wanted. The photo and the description did not match. The photo is of the shoe we wanted, but the description was a different shoe that my grandson did not want. I'm sure the shoes are good quality, but I have to return them, as he won't wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Mollux

customer_reviews.title: Playing basketball on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves these! They are tight on the ankles, but that’s what he was looking for. It gives him great ankle support. He said he feels like he’s playing on a cloud when wearing these!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: LJ
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as portrayed only the box was a bit frayed but I suppose that's the handler other than that it's amazing for movement and style, support and comfort and speed
customer_reviews.author: Keanu

customer_reviews.title: Son loves these shoes
customer_reviews.text: My loves these shoes and wears them to play basketball. It matches his uniform well.
customer_reviews.author: Big Jeff

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoe I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoe I've ever worn. It allows me to move easily. It feels like I'm walking on a pillow. And I love the design since I'm a veteran.
customer_reviews.author: Tekken

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my teenage nephew and he loves the fit, style, and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Miss B

customer_reviews.title: Importante
customer_reviews.text: If you are a ten, go a half size bigger for this pair of shoes
customer_reviews.author: MathewLJC1991

customer_reviews.title: The number one basketball shoe ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is now the second pair of these shoes that I own. This is hands-down the best sneakers that you will ever own.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Webb

customer_reviews.title: He says they have the best traction of any he has worn
customer_reviews.text: This is my sons second pair of these shoes. He says they have the best traction of any he has worn. Shoes seem to be very durable.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: When i viewed the prouct online it showed black colour but upon receiving the shoe is greyish color

customer_reviews.title: Know your foot measurement
customer_reviews.text: great shoe, it is just that I didn't know my foot size. so if you know your foot size, you are good to go with this shoe.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes ive ever worn. wearing them for a warehouse job 8-12 hours a day, still more comfortable than anything else, even without soles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them (my 4th pair..so far)!! They fit like a glove and do the job well.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Too small!! Usually size 11fits me well, I ordered size 12 but still could not slide my feet in

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: This product was a lot better than what I expected really comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.author: Jose G. Clariond

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied with order
customer_reviews.text: Items arrived on time and as described. Totally satisfied with order.

customer_reviews.title: Best Nike shoes I ever got thanks
customer_reviews.text: I love it this shoes they very comfortable and they fit Experted perfect thank you

customer_reviews.title: Other then that they are great.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the shoes but they are hard to put on and take off. Other then that they are great.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Get lots of complements, especially from people that have no clue about kicks.

customer_reviews.title: great shoe for volleyball
customer_reviews.text: love the shoes, fit well, good grip on them. I use them for volleyball and there perfect. took me a min to realize the top strap goes through the middle loop. once they are through the loop the lip doesn't slide down. Great shoe overall, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sneaker, the sock has to be broken in for a proper fit. Altogether a great basketball sneaker
customer_reviews.author: K. Bap

customer_reviews.title: Buy half size more than your actual size.
customer_reviews.text: Buy half size more than your actual size. My size is 10.5US, but I had to buy 11 to make it fit with basketball socks.
customer_reviews.author: Last Airbender

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: So hard to put on, we had to return them. Actually my son couldn’t even get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Adler

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves them.
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my grandson. He loves them. The only thing I’m unhappy about is that I ordered a different color than What I got.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for and design
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting basketball shoes I've ever worn. Having no laces is AMAZING. And honestly, they look really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Ian B.

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my grandson for school in the fall. Unfortunately, he could not even get his foot into the shoe. We did not realize that the shoe did not open in the front; there is no tongue, laces, etc. this has nothing to do with the shoe itself. My grandson loved the shoe. But useless if he can’t get his foot into it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Drake

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shade of color is deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: The color of the sneakers as shown in the picture is not correct. The sneakers itself is actually much brighter red. I chose these sneakers because the shade of red is darker, somewhat like burgundy, however when the sneakers arrived and I saw that the red was much more of a brighter red. This was disappointing. The snake itself however is a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: George S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them! I gave him these sneakers for his birthday and now he wears them to school!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. I don't believe I will need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I don't believe I will need to use my ankle braces now. The only issue is that it's definitely too small. I'm a 12 and ordered a 13 and it barely fits! Order one size bigger than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Abibe2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is playing volleyball and says they are amazing!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a struggle to put on but once they're on you feel absolute comfort.

customer_reviews.title: Ankle support
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe!!! I see why Lebron plays and moves the way he does now!! GREAT SHOE FOR BIG MAN!! I’m 6’2 size 13 and it actually makes me feel like I have a small foot(moves faster).

customer_reviews.title: EXCELENT
customer_reviews.text: Excelent! The seller also write me when the product arrived, and asked me about how the quality was! I surely recommend

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are awesome!! I ordered black but got the silver for the price I was a little disappointed but I put them on and fell in love!!!!

customer_reviews.title: He loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my boyfriend and he loved them!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers for a busy, extremely flat-footed AAU basketball player. True to size. Comfortable with excellent ankle support.

customer_reviews.title: Tight to fit in your foot at the beginning.
customer_reviews.text: Walking with these shoes is beautiful! The only issue is when you try to fit in your foot.

customer_reviews.text: Husband loved them. Says they are great for playing basketball and a bunch of other basketball things that I don’t get. Bottom line-he loves them.

customer_reviews.title: These tennis for perfectly and feel great..
customer_reviews.text: These tennis for perfectly and feel great... the hold to your feet with a secure grip.. I recommend 100%

customer_reviews.title: The produc it self it was very god, but ...
customer_reviews.text: The produc it self it was very god, but you guys sent me in a smaller size so that it not feet me. as I was in an international travel to USA it was not able to send it back or change

customer_reviews.title: Please I would like to know how I can use this shoes
customer_reviews.text: Please I would like to know how I can use this shoes, because is not possible to introduce my feet in the shoes and it doesn't have any zipper to let me put my feet in.
customer_reviews.author: GLADYS MARCANO

customer_reviews.title: Good for Basketball
customer_reviews.text: My Son loves the shoes great fit. We both like the design. Really good for basketball.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and love the straps vs
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Great shoes and love the straps vs. laces. I would definitely buy these shoes again.

customer_reviews.title: They fit very well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my very picky son and he wears them everyday!

customer_reviews.text: They are not produced in retailer stores anymore so good purchase here

customer_reviews.title: It arrived three days ahead of schedule and fits very comfortably. Will certainly order from this seller again
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this sneaker. It arrived three days ahead of schedule and fits very comfortably. Will certainly order from this seller again.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are poor quality, especially for $126.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible shoe. After wearing 6 times in practice, toe is splitting from sole! Unbelievable. My son saved up his money for these, and now it is apparent they will not last. Going to try and return them asap.

customer_reviews.title: ... 12 year old son loves his sneakers he takes good care of them and they are pretty good well

customer_reviews.text: This shoes are awesome, I love the design, the way they adjust to your foot, haven't test them yet but no doubt they'll performed great, only complain about this particular design is the color in the pictures, they are nothing like in the pictures. This is the real color. Sorry for the bad quality of my pictures.

product_meta.title: Nike Lebron Soldier XI Mens Basketball Shoes
product_meta.description: The laceless Nike Lebron Soldier XI features an innovative support system to keep your foot locked in. They have four hook-and-loop adjustable elastic straps, lightweight mesh upper, Zoom air cushioning, pull tabs, and a rubber sole with multi-surface traction.
